content:
Sure! Here's a shift rotation sheet for GM social media agents with 7 agents:

Shift Rotation Sheet for GM Social Media Agents

|  | Monday | Tuesday | Wednesday | Thursday | Friday | Saturday | Sunday |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Week 1 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 | Agent 5 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 |
| Week 2 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 | Agent 5 |
| Week 3 | Agent 4 | Agent 5 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 |
| Week 4 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 | Agent 5 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 | Agent 1 |

Note: This rotation is for a 4-week period, with each agent working one day off per week. You can adjust the duration of the rotation and the number of days off per week based on your team's specific needs.
